--- layout: apidoc title: Tile5 API Documentation ---

T5.Pos (internal class)

The T5.Pos class is a currently an internal class that is used by the T5.Geo.Position module. This is currently a little obscure and is due to a change in the way Tile5 is structured internally.

Methods

offset(latOffset, lonOffset)

Return a new T5.Geo.Position which is the original pos offset by the specified latOffset and lonOffset (which are specified in km distance)
